description: This course provides a capstone to the concentration. Taught as a seminar, it investigates critical and specialized issues in media from multiple and often competing perspectives. Topics change regularly and address a wide range of media-related concerns. Sample topics include media culture, race and media, media use and child development, and the social and political utility of video documentaries. Prerequisite: Media Studies 160 or permission of instructor. Offered Spring Semester.
name: Topics in Media
prerequisites: Media Studies 160 or permission of instructor. Offered Spring Semester.
